contact.2: Use contact information below to get in touch with the Morelo (MRL) community.

download.2: In this section you can find and download the latest version available of the Morelo software, as well as hardware, light and mobile wallets.
download.3: The GUI wallet provides a nice user interface, adaptable to all kinds of users, but it is especially recommended for less technical people who want to quickly send and receive MRL.

features.2: Implementation of Ring Signatures and Ring Confidential transactions protocols obfuscate your financial data on the blockchain by default.
features.4: Morelos blockchain decentralization is supported globally by individuals, granting network operations independent from private and/or institutional organizations.
features.6: Morelo provides a complete range of cross-platform software ready for deployment. Our software permits a simple and secured user experience.
features.8: With the contribution of our community members, Morelo offers easy, described documentation and technical support.

description.1: Galaxia network in testing phase. Soon ready for publish.
description.2: End of Galaxia network testing, switching to MainNet.
description.4: Swap 1:1 from Galaxia to Morelo network.
description.5: Implementation of ZeroMQ in our services.
description.6: Listing on bkex.com and coinbing.com exchages.
description.7: First release of official GUI wallet published.
